settings.heading: Will I receive Quality products from Sumangal Banaras
settings.content: With 50+ Years of legacy, we adhere to strict quality and design benchmarks. Every Sumangal Banaras product goes through Quality Control process to ensure that you receivethe best. Every product has its own HSN code to prove its genuinity.

settings.heading: What is HSN Code ?
settings.content:
HSN code stands for “Harmonized System of Nomenclature”. This system has beenintroduced for the systematic classification of goods all over the world.

HSM code is a 6-digituniform code that classifies 5000+ products and is accepted worldwide.

settings.heading: I am not able to place my order.
settings.content:
We are sorry you're facing hiccups while placing the order. Here are some options:

Get in touch with our fashion advisor or book a video call appointment: 8795663333

OR

Email us at: sales@sumangalbanaras.com

Your issues will be resolved swiftly by our team.

settings.heading: Can I place an order for a Sold-out product ?
settings.content:
For soldout products, if you're registered with us, add those products to your wishlist.

Also, you can fill the form on the product page to let us know you are interested in the product and we will get back to you when the product is available

settings.heading: My Delivery/Pickup has not arrived
settings.content:
We’re sorry to hear that! In case your pick-up has not arrived at the scheduled hour,please drop a mail at: sales@sumangalbanaras.com.

With your order ID and our team will get back to you regarding the status or reschedule aconvenient time for you.

settings.heading: I am happy with your service, where do I write my review ?
settings.content:
You can review us at:

1. Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/npPH4oUKZMxFDkVA6

2. On our website at the left down corner.

settings.heading: Who do I contact if I face any payment issues ?
settings.content:
If you face any issues regarding payment,

Inform us within 48 hrs of the payment via call at: 8795663333

OR

Email us at sales@sumangalbanaras.com

settings.heading: What are the delivery charges for National Orders ?
settings.content: We provide free delivery across all domestic Orders within India

settings.heading: What are the delivery charges for International Orders ?
settings.content: The shipping charges will be calculated at the time of placing the order. Other duties such as VAT/Customs, Taxes and import duties are not included in our ordering process but may be charged to you by your government. They are entirely your responsibility

settings.heading: How long will it take my order to be delivered ?
settings.content: The dispatch time for your order has been mentioned on individual product pages. We will ensure the timely, fast and secure dispatch of your order.

settings.heading: Do you offer Cash On Delivery ?
settings.content: Yes, we offer Cash On Delivery on all domestic orders within India. For International orders, we only take prepaid orders.
